analysis.description:
Forwarder.flush (/unique_chucks/15/0x6630f77801e3d8ee4c624a628d0979ab9e7d111b.sol#77-82) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! parentAddress.call.value(this.balance)() (/unique_chucks/15/0x6630f77801e3d8ee4c624a628d0979ab9e7d111b.sol#82)

Forwarder.flushTokens (/unique_chucks/15/0x6630f77801e3d8ee4c624a628d0979ab9e7d111b.sol#58-72) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- forwarderBalance == 0

WalletSimple.verifyMultiSig (/unique_chucks/15/0x6630f77801e3d8ee4c624a628d0979ab9e7d111b.sol#242-277) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- expireTime < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/15/0x6630f77801e3d8ee4c624a628d0979ab9e7d111b.sol#257-259)

WalletSimple.recoverAddressFromSignature uses assembly (/unique_chucks/15/0x6630f77801e3d8ee4c624a628d0979ab9e7d111b.sol#305-320)
	- /unique_chucks/15/0x6630f77801e3d8ee4c624a628d0979ab9e7d111b.sol#313-318

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/15/0x6630f77801e3d8ee4c624a628d0979ab9e7d111b.sol#50:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
